titleStmt.title: The coppy of a letter sent from France by Mr. Walter Mountagu to his father the Lord Privie Seale, with his answere thereunto also a second answere to the same letter by the Faukland.
titleStmt.author: Montagu, Walter, 1603?-1677.
Falkland, Lucius Cary, Viscount, 1610?-1643.
Manchester, Henry Montagu, Earl of, 1563?-1642.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
